name: Big Guy Simulator
description:
Big Guy Simulator (2022) is awesome.

Features

  1. Guy
    1. He is big
  2. Tree
    1. Also big
    2. Waiting for Godot reference
  3. Soundtrack
    1. Award winning (platinum certified)
    2. Pre-distorted for your listening pleasure
  4. Gameplay (alleged)
    1. It's there
    2. Arrow keys
    3. Space Bar
